transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: haji
Executive: haji mai yasbin enterprises bol raha hun gopiganj uttar pradesh se
Executive: ji sir
Customer: mere to ek india mart ke dwara order aa raha hai usme COD dikh raha hai wo party cash on delivery mai nahi dena cha raha dena cha raha payment payment option kaise aayega
Executive: sir kahan se baat kar rahe hain
Customer: mai uttar pradesh gopiganj se bol raha hun up up sir company ka naam
batayenge ek bari
Customer: yasbi enterprises
Executive: sd enterprises ji
Customer: ji
Customer: wo ek mera 2500 ka order india mart ke madhyam se accept hua hai but kya reason kya ho raha hai usme party bol raha hai COD aa raha hai sir not mane advance payment options nahi aa raha hai
Executive: ha
Customer: to kaise isko kiya jaye usko ki advance payment options kyu nahi aa raha hai usme uske baad
Executive: sir advance payment option nahi aa raha hai customer ke pass
Customer: nahi nahi customer ke pass nahi ja raha hai bol raha mai jab order de raha hun order complete kar raha hun to payment option nahi aa raha hai usme COD likh raha hai aisa problem to nahi hai india mart ke madhyam se baat karta hun
Executive: sir wo to aap unhe direct karwa lijiye na apne account mein
Customer: ab wo direct apne account mein kaise kara wo to bola mai india mart ke madhyam se payment karna cha raha hun na
Executive: sir india mart india mart ke through ab payment gateway nahi chal raha hai india mart ka payment gateway do saal pehle hi band ho chuka hai aap unhe directly boliye ki direct aapke account mein karwaye payment
Customer: wahi to problem aa raha hai sir order kiya hua hai to gadbad ho ja raha hai
Executive: aap ab directly bolenge to hi jyada better rahega sir COD pe kyunki hum bhi recommend nahi karte apne customer ko bolne ke liye ki COD pe bhej dijiye aap kyunki COD pe baad mein koi issue aa jaye customer na de paisa to wo dikkat ho jati hai
Customer: mai COD to mai khud nahi COD nahi de raha hun isiliye to mai COD nahi accept kar raha hun na
Customer: kyunki wo andhra pradesh ka customer hai bahut dur ka mai kahan se khojunga
Executive: wahi wahi ji ji ji
Customer: but kya aisa koi options nahi hai india mart ke dwara jaise ki wo usme mera jo payment link hai mera jo account number hai usko share kar saku uske pass
Executive: nahi sir aisa aisa option nahi hai sir payment gateway hum jo hai nahi karte hain sir isme ab payment gateway bhi band ho gaya wo bhi cheez band ho gayi hai sir
Customer: achcha ji ji ji
Customer: theek hai sir wahi cheez mai soch raha tha kaise ye to problem aa jayegi har bar aisa order accept kar lunga pata chala to payment nahi hai COD mein kitna dunga
Executive: nahi nahi sir COD to india mart khud hi recommend nahi karega aapko
Customer: to COD aana nahi chahiye samne wale ke customer ke pass COD system option kyu aa raha hai
Executive: sir aisa kuch unhone bheja hai aapko screenshot wagera
Customer: ha bheja hua hai tabhi to mai bola na wo mere ko bheja hai
Executive: achcha sir ek bari mere number pe bhejiye mai team se check kar lunga ek bari 78270 number likh sakte hain
Customer: likha hua hai sir nahi wo likh raha hai mere ko only COD showing sir wo likha hua hai delivery address wo sab likha payment method only payment method jo hai cash on delivery likh raha hai
Executive: ha bol dijiye sir wo COD agar aa bhi raha hai aapke pass for example let's say unke pass COD ka option aa raha hai to aap mere account mein process kar dijiye GST details unhe bhej dijiye GST to aaj kal sab online hi hota hai bol aap bol dijiye portal pe check kar lenge GST aapke naam hi hai wo to matlab unhe kya boliye sir aap unhe boliyega apna GST bhej ke apna jo bhi details bhej ke bhej dijiye aur unhe boliye GST government in portal pe jayenge GST naam dalenge unke pass unhe wo check karne ke liye aayega wo check kar sakte hain koi bhi check kar sakta hai aapka GST aapke naam se
Customer: wahi to mai bhi bola wahi cheez maine aage isko problem hai sir kis cheez ka mal hai matlab kya aap de rahe hain unhe kya requirement hai
Executive: hai wo sanitary hai wo bathroom wala hai
Customer: achcha aur amount kitna hai sir
Customer: 2500 achcha 2500 ka aur ye idhar andhra ke hai customer aapke sir COD COD ka mat kariye ga unhe matlab apne phone se bol dijiye bata dijiyega ki ki mai generate kar dunga invoice aur unhe bol dijiyega ye bata dijiyega sir india mart ka customer care number hai
Executive: aapko koi bhi aapko lagta hai ki trust factor nahi hai to aap koi bhi nahi customer care pe call karke puch lijiyega ki registered supplier hai ki nahi registered supplier hai jaise kafi logo ko trust factor hota hai na sir ki registered hai ki nahi hai fake hai ki nahi to aap bol dijiyega ki mai paid supplier hun aap india mart dot com pe jaiye india mart dot com wo ya to www india mart dot com pe mere registration dekh lijiye ya aap customer care pe call karke puch lijiyega registered hai ki nahi hai customer care wale khud hi bata denge unhe ki registered supplier hai
Customer: oh okay mai usse baat karunga aap humko payment direct kaise laga sakte hain na kya sir
Customer: mai bol deta hun india mart customer care pe aap inquiry kar sakte hain payment option ha ha bilkul sir aise aise kar sakte hain bilkul
Customer: okay okay sir theek hai sir
Executive: okay okay thank you sir okay sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's order shows COD option.

- Wants advance payment option.

- Wants to share payment link with customer.



Resolution:

- Executive stated payment gateway is closed.

- Advised to get direct payment to account.

- Advised to share GST details with customer.

- Advised customer to call customer care for verification.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send screenshot to executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- cod, payment gateway, gst, direct payment, trustseal
